Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.entity.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Object
Represents an enemy in the game with attributes such as health points, attack, defense, block, and gold drop.
Author:
Yacine

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, int maxHp, int attack, int defense, int goldDrop)
      Creates a new Enemy with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the enemy
      maxHp - the maximum health points of the enemy
      attack - the attack value of the enemy
      defense - the defense value of the enemy
      goldDrop - the amount of gold dropped by the enemy upon defeat
